title: PVP.net patcher Kernel error
body: New laptop and I just downloaded LoL but I cant load the game. Any suggestions to get the patcher to work?

replies.body:
Run the client as ADMINISTRATOR.

Watch the video here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ewGwx21q96c
same thing im getting a rads error ive uninstalled and reinstalled 2 times and also ran it as admin...

Patcher Kernel error usually occur if you haven't given League the right permissions to operate properly. Try launching League as admin from the installation locale (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends). Simply right-click on the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file and select *run as administrator*.

Please let me know if this worked for you.
